item.title: Going Abroad / Some kind of introduction
item.description: All of a sudden I found myself without a plan, but with an agreement to stay at U.C. Berkeley for 5 months. Thanks to the help of Peter Sestoft, I found a plethora of other financial opportunities which would later turn out to make the stay possible. This will be updated…
